sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import { responseJSON } from '../flight-data'; class Search extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { tableData: responseJSON, origin: '', arrival:'' } } originChange = (event) => { console.log('working',event.target.value); this.setState({ origin:event.target.value}) } arrivalChange = (event) => { console.log('working',event.target.value) this.setState({ arrival:event.target.value}); } render(){ return(
Flight No Flight Name Depature and Arrival Time Duration No of Stops Price Total no of Results
1234567 Air India 08:00 and 10:00 2 Hrs Non Sop Rs. 3500 -
) } } export default Search;
